amendment.description: An amendment numbered 40 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to prevent the Office of Surface Mining Reclamation and Enforcement from enforcing perpetual deed restrictions on Abandoned Mine Land Economic Revitalization program projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Griffith amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Griffith amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
